Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 69th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Benjamin Martinez (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Carlo Tafoya (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2015, hitting .284 with 20 HR, 81 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/16/2017 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
